description: VISHAL SHIVHARE is an entrepreneur with over 15 years of experience. A keen observer of the global financial market, Vishal is also responsible for the successful turnaround of several companies. His interests range from finance to philosophy, and he loves to catch the pulse of new business trends.
name: Vishal Shivhare
